initial_reviews.review_title: The "Do It For Me" program is well organized, has great content and saves so much time!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about FMG Suite?
As a Barron's and Forbes Top Advisor, I have high standards for not just the type of content I share with clients, but how it comes across. I believe communication is so important in our industry; words have impact. I honestly didn't think the DIFM content would be up to our standards, but in many ways, it is better than what I would spend hours writing myself. The voice is right, the topics are relevant and informative, and the warmth of the author comes through in a helpful way. It doesnt feel like marketing; clients feel important and heard. This turnkey program is a real value add for clients and makes spreading the word so easy for them. 5 stars for FMG!

What do you dislike about FMG Suite?
Not much. I have nothing more to say even though this G2site requires a minimum numbers of charachters

What problems is FMG Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Time

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about FMG Suite?
FMG (no longer called FMG Suite) is easy to use. It's great if you can't afford your own marketing team. You can have a whole website without knowing to code. You can do blogs and emails straight from the platform. They also have pre-loaded blogs, social media, emails, etc. Does depend on the plan you have with them.

What do you dislike about FMG Suite?
The pre-loaded content is a bit cookie-cutter and a little bland, but it is informative. Again, depends on the plan you have what content is available to you. If you are interested in more personalization or have more experience with coding/marketing, it sometimes feels limiting.

What problems is FMG Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
The main problem that FMG solves is how to market while balancing compliance. Their in-house compliance is great and usually fast, however, if you are using a specific broker their compliance is not always as speedy when responding.

initial_reviews.review_title: I can't think of anything nice to say
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about FMG Suite?
Nothing! What was sold and reality are exact opposites.

What do you dislike about FMG Suite?
It is significantly shorter to list what I like, nothing.  I was sold a "completely custom" website that would be designed from the ground up using their design and copyright staff.  I was sold that there was a huge amount of content to use for marketing to the decision makers on defined contribution plans (CFO and HR).

Reality?  Choose among maybe a dozen prebuilt themes,  colors and a photo album.  They will move your text from your current website and make changes you would like to change.  Oh, content?  This "service" offers the smallest content library I have ever seen of any of the providers and SURPRISE none geared toward my intended target audience.

The day I was provided credentials to access the system was the day, within minutes, that I cancelled.  I have written proof from them that they acknowledged the receipt of my cancellation.

Now they want me to pay them a "buy out" of my contract.  I've turned this over to my credit card company and state attorney for resolution.

What problems is FMG Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
None!  I thought they were a reputable firm before I hired them.  They must have significant financial problems to want to hang onto my tiny account for false promises.  I've since hired a reputable firm to complete the work I need.  It is twice the cost of FMG Suite but it will at least be a service that is valuable and what I was sold.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about FMG Suite?
FMG is conveniently connected directly to my compliance department so everything done is approved and I'm adhering to rules and regulations. The peace of mind that comes with that is invaluable. Our site is clean. Content is easy to edit. And customer support is willing to go the extra mile to walk you through how to add things if you don't know how. They also have a wonderful educational resource library and their workshops are useful and timely.

What do you dislike about FMG Suite?
The design elements are limited and it takes time to get improvements made to the site. Still waiting to be able to redesign pages to make them feel more current, interactive, and engaging.

Recommendations to others considering FMG Suite:
They know the financial services industry and will understand your needs.

What problems is FMG Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
The internet is what connects us and having a website is still the foundation of legitimizing your business. FMG has built us a site we can be proud of and their service provides us with autonomy to edit, update, and expand without having to rely on them for every change. I'm grateful for the service and the ease of use, allowing me to implement changes tasked to me, in a convenient dashboard format. I am also THRILLED by the new programs, partners, and offerings they are adding to their lineup that will bring more SEO, better design features, and more marketing resources. It's been a slow growth, but it's something I'm looking forward to about my site provider - and how often do you say that?

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about FMG Suite?
Content that they provide for the site is ok.

What do you dislike about FMG Suite?
Almost everything.  It took nearly two months to get the site to go live.  Our compliance dept wanted an additional disclosure on a couple of things, and FMG would not even entertain it.  Their quote was, "that's not our problem.  Then they updated something a couple of months later, I still never got an actual answer.  But it broke every link on our site. Then about a month after that, I noticed that this "update" removed the SSL off of our site.  When our contract was ending, I gave notice that we weren't going to renew, and they took down our site three weeks before our contract was up.

Recommendations to others considering FMG Suite:
Keep looking.  I had to constantly check things on the site to make sure they were working.  They were supposed to take care of it to save me time.  That wasn't the case.  The marketing stuff they provided was ok, not great.  But the actual website was a disaster.

What problems is FMG Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
They provided our website and some of our marketing.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about FMG Suite?
I used FMG Suite to engage with clients of a financial advisory firm. One of my favorite things about the platform is the ability to send out birthday and greeting cards to clients individually. It helped add a personal touch to engaging with clients that I think was very appreciated.

What do you dislike about FMG Suite?
I thought that navigating the site could be a little confusing. The categories weren't always very intuitive and sometimes I couldn't find what I was looking for. I also found some of the content to appear a little bland and outdated.

Recommendations to others considering FMG Suite:
They seem to have helpful support people so I would definitely leverage them to understand how the platform can best be used for you and how to maximize your efforts.

What problems is FMG Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
This is a great way to get more "touches" on our financial advisory clients in a personal way. I also loved being able to send out content knowing it was already approved by our compliance. I think it gave me a lot of good ideas for ways to better reach our clients.

Nothing! What was sold and reality are exact opposites.

What do you dislike about FMG Suite?
It is significantly shorter to list what I like, nothing.  I was sold a "completely custom" website that would be designed from the ground up using their design and copyright staff.  I was sold that there was a huge amount of content to use for marketing to the decision makers on defined contribution plans (CFO and HR).

This "service" offers the smallest content library I have ever seen of any of the providers and SURPRISE none geared toward my intended target audience.

The day I was provided credentials to access the system was the day, within minutes, that I cancelled.  I have written proof from them that they acknowledged the receipt of my cancellation.

Now they want me to pay them a "buy out" of my contract.  I've turned this over to my credit card company and state attorney for resolution.

What problems is FMG Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
None!  I thought they were a reputable firm before I hired them.  They must have significant financial problems to want to hang onto my tiny account for false promises.  I've since hired a reputable firm to complete the work I need.  It is twice the cost of FMG Suite but it will at least be a service that is valuable and what I was sold.
